name: Dana - A Special Camp - FUTANARI EDITION [XXX Hentai NSFW Minigame]
name_original: Dana - A Special Camp - FUTANARI EDITION [XXX Hentai NSFW Minigame]
description:
MainPlot:

It is summer, and you are camping with your friend Dana... 

You have known each other for a long time and you have never been so close... so better act nice, don't you think? It could lead to comething interesting and she could have something to confess too...

What's different in Futanari Edition? Dana's actually a futanari!

If you like these games consider supporting us on www.patreon.com/kravenar !
